column1: If #AmericanIdol doesn’t come on at 7 because of @12NewsNow showing this #coronavirus I’m gonna be livid! I just want to watch my show and stop thinking about this damn thing!
If #AmericanIdol doesn’t come on at 7 because of @12NewsNow showing this #coronavirus I’m gonna be livid! I just want to watch my show and stop thinking about this damn thing!
